© 2023. All rights reserved.

Welcome to the website of the Berkeley Carillon Guild! Get started by learning about the carillon, the guild, or how you can get involved.

Concerts are at 7:50am, noon, and 6pm for 10 minutes from Monday to Friday. We also play a 10 minute noon concert on Saturdays and an hour-long recital on Sundays at 2pm, with programs available in front of Sather Tower for the latter.

During the weekend of August 12-13, we will be holding the 9th Berkeley Carillon Festival! Bring your picnic blankets and join us for concerts at noon and 2pm each day.

Programs will be available in print at the door of Sather Tower can also be found digitally here.

We are a student group acting independently of the University of California. We take full responsibility for our organization and this website.
